pullrequest.title: Added icons and hooked up file menu actions

content.raw: OK, I've merged in the latest default branch (and fixed a small bug introduced in pull request #7 where there was an indentation error due to a multi-line comment in a function). Hopefully it worked and thus pull request merges in nicely!
content.html: OK, I've merged in the latest default branch (and fixed a small bug introduced in pull request #7 where there was an indentation error due to a multi-line comment in a function). Hopefully it worked and thus pull request merges in nicely!
